EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Airline Operators Webinar: APU - Technical Updates, Roadmap and New Offerings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Auxiliary Power Unit - Technical Updates, Roadmap and New Offerings
Please log on to the webinar platform by clicking here <[[https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2341596/ED7058C2D432EC05325E2F85D5791FE8]]>, fifteen minutes before the event starts.
Date: May 20, 2020 Time: 1:00 p.m. GMT, 8:00 a.m. CT {{my.Add to Calendar}}
We look forward to meeting you online for this webinar.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
